input.sentences: we had a great new year 's party last weekend .
my mom bought a huge cake for all of us .
all of my friends show up .
i got some really cool glasses .
afterward we all played games in the kitchen .
output.sentences: We had a weekend party with my friends.
My Mom prepared a huge cake for the party.
My friends and I loved it.
The glasses they gave to me its pretty cool.
We played our games in the kitchen.
